p: Rosin pentaglycidyl ether is a solid. It can be prepared from epoxidized rosin, water, potassium hydroxide and epichlorohydrin according to Scheme 6, and using such separation methods as vacuum drying, filtration, precipitation and washing [ 164]. It can be used as a component in epoxy resin systems showing high glass transition temperature as well as elastic modulus [ 164].
